subject: feat(query): add interactive query builder with relationship predicates and pipeline
body:
Replace plain-text QueryBar with interactive QueryBuilder that supports visual
filter rows, pipeline chaining, and an advanced text mode. Extend the query
engine with relationship predicates (IN/OUT/CONN for arc-aware node filtering),
comparison operators (<, >, <=, >= with date/number/string auto-detection), and
a pipeline executor where each step narrows results while preserving full graph
context for relationship evaluation.

New files:
- QueryBuilder.tsx: Visual builder with filter rows, pipeline steps, dual mode
- QueryFilterRow.tsx: Individual filter row (label, property, title, relationship)
- QueryBuilder.css: Dark theme styles for builder components
- useGraphMetadata.ts: Hook extracting distinct labels/keys/values for autocomplete
- docs/working/interactive-query-builder.md: Architecture and design plan

Key design decisions:
- Builder produces AST directly via builderFilterToAST/builderStepToAST,
  bypassing text parsing for reliable structured query construction
- Pipeline executor uses full graph context (all arcs/nodes) for relationship
  predicates even when candidate nodes have been narrowed by prior steps
- Case-insensitive property key lookup in evaluator to handle parser lowercasing
  vs camelCase data model keys
